SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the clockwise direction from Damage/Loss Rate ?

SRP.A: The next dimension counterclockwise from Damage/Loss Rate  is Service Coverage Rate.

VPR.A: label {Fuel Cost as Rate of Revenue} encloses the largest score

VPR.Q: What are the strongest and weakest dimension of Lara, Lin and Brooks?
VPR.A: The strongest aspect is {Fuel Cost as Rate of Revenue}, while the weakest aspect is{ On-Time Delivery Rate }.

MSR.Q: For Lara, Lin and Brooks, based on the data shown in the radar chart, which dimension does it most need to improve?
